name: Irene Anna Kurien

top_projects.name: sudoku-solver
top_projects.description: A python program that solves given sudoku using the backtracking algorithm.

irenekurien/lending.summary: Recent updates focused on resolving various loan repayment issues, such as correct interest accrual, repayment schedule generation, and voucher subtypes. Fixes also addressed loan restructure validation, freeze date handling, and disbursement security.

zerodha/erpnext.summary: Notable recent activity includes a pull request to fix sanction limit calculations by excluding closed and sanctioned loans when determining total loan amounts.

frappe/lending.summary: Recent pull request updated the validation for loan restructure dates by ensuring only submitted entries are considered in loan repayment processing.

profile_summary:
Irene Anna Kurien is a seasoned developer with a strong proficiency in TypeScript, Python, and Kotlin, leveraging these programming languages to deliver high-quality solutions that meet and exceed industry standards. With a professional network of over 57 followers and an impressive portfolio of 62 public repositories, Irene has established herself as a highly skilled and reliable developer with a proven track record of innovation and technical expertise.

As a versatile and results-driven developer, Irene excels in crafting scalable, efficient, and maintainable software solutions that drive business growth and success. Her passion for staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends enables her to provide cutting-edge solutions that meet the ever-evolving needs of the industry. With a unique blend of technical acumen, creative problem-solving skills, and dedication to delivering exceptional results, Irene is a valuable asset to any team or project.
